rows.label: qev090501_MSG0001
rows.name: Sensei! Sensei, it's terrible![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0002
rows.name: It's Clarissa's team![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0002_2
rows.name: They...they'll all be killed if we don't do something![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0003
rows.name:
But what can we do?! Who's going to...
Er, I mean, where can we possibly...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0004
rows.name: Sensei, what do we DO?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0005
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0006
rows.name: KAAAAAAAAAATSU![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0007
rows.name:
The greater the crisis, the calmer a soldier must remain.
I taught you this, did I not?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0008
rows.name: Have you already forgotten what you learned under me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0009
rows.name: N-no, Sensei![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0010
rows.name: R-right... I'll explain from the start.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0011
rows.name: Do you remember Clarissa, Sensei?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0012
rows.name: I never forget a student. She was the same year as you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0013
rows.name:
I heard a number of you academy kids
formed a team together. Anyway, go on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0014
rows.name:
We lost communication with them.
All of a sudden, just...silence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0015
rows.name: I see. Do you know where they are?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0016
rows.name:
I asked HQ to put together a search party,
but they don't have anyone available...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0017
rows.name:
Then I'll go look for her myself.
So...can I ask you to come with me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0018
rows.name: ...Please.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0018_2
rows.name: I can't break any more promises to these kids.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0019
rows.name: Promises? Wow, Sensei, you still remember that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_JNK0010
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev090501_SEL0011
rows.name: Agree to help.

rows.label: qev090501_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev090501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask about the promise Boz√© made.

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0020
rows.name:
Thank you, my friend.
I will not forget this. You have my word.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0021
rows.name:
Nothing special. The kind soldiers like us
have heard countless times before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0022
rows.name:
But my word is a mighty oak,
and so long as I draw breath, I shall keep it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0023_m
rows.name: Now, if you're ready? We ride![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0023_f
rows.name: Now, if you're ready? We ride![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0024
rows.name: Thank you, Sensei. And thank you, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090501_MSG0025
rows.name:
I know you'll do whatever it takes to bring
Clarissa and the others home alive.[ST:wait ]
